entry.def: Imaging is the process of forming images that represent things such as sound waves, temperature, chemicals, or electrical activity.

means.word_mean: 1. the ability to form mental images of things or events;

sentences.sentence: "he could still hear her in his imagination"

means.word_mean: 2. (medicine) obtaining pictures of the interior of the body
